Summary: Star like UFO in sky (Golden, CO)
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Golden
There were no other sightings in Golden on or around June 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWas staring at the stars at Golden riverwalk and one started moving. I thought it was a satellite but then the object started curving a moving around strangely. It seemed to notice when we were looking too, sometimes it would disappear. It eventually disappeared and never came back.
